rules.ruleString: Any passed co-req (I/W) unit in {MKP2700, MKP2701, MKW2111, MKW2402}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {3201, GBU2404%, MKB2404, MKB2420, MKF2121, MKG2420%, MKT212, MKT2121, MKW2121%, MKW2420%}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETC2500, MKB2420, MKC2500, MKF2121, MKG2420}

description: The process of marketing research. Role of research in the marketing decision process. Developing key outputs -- brief, proposal, report. Planning and managing a research project. Qualitative and quantitative research techniques. Statistical analysis, marketing interpretation and reporting.
